meanings.definition: Having the flavor or aroma of mint.
meanings.sent1: The gum tasted minty and cool.
meanings.sent2: The tea had a minty freshness to it.
meanings.sent3: She breathed in the minty air and felt instantly awake.
meanings.sent4: The minty scent wafted through the room, calming everyone down.
meanings.sent5: The minty flavor exploded in her mouth, making her smile.

meanings.sent1: The soap had a minty color and smell.
meanings.sent2: The lotion had a minty green hue.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his minty socks would keep his feet fresh all day.
meanings.sent4: The minty pattern on the wallpaper made the room feel cooler.
meanings.sent5: Her minty dress sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.sent1: The minty breeze on the beach was so cool.
meanings.sent2: The drink was minty and made her feel awake.
meanings.sent3: He sprayed the minty perfume and felt instantly refreshed.
meanings.sent4: The minty taste of the ice cream woke up his taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The minty sensation on her skin made her feel alive.
